Lance Lafontaine

Who Am I?

Hello, world! A first post from a new developer.

06 November 2014

My name is Lance Lafontaine and I am a software engineering student at Concordia University in Montreal, Canada. I love full-stack web dev, Linux and Unix operating systems, and everything about open source and startups. Why software, you ask? Believe it or not, my lifelong coding quest began with ... DNA and Proteins. Once upon a time, I was studying in molecular biology. I had decided to pursue my studies in the field after my introduction to it in college. The content was rather interesting, and I was pretty good at memorizing biochemical reactions and cellular functions and structures. Fast-forward...
